text: Anagema higeno'a, Ahapu'a kasnampa nera amanage huno antahige'ne, inankna huno anara hugahie, higeno ana kasnampa ne'mo'a amanage huno kenona hu'ne. Magoke magoke provinsifi sondia vahete'ma kvama hu'naza kasefa sondia vahe'mo'za anara hugahaze. Higeno, iza ana hara agafa hugahie, huno higeno, kagra agafa hugahane huno hu'ne.
